content.webTitle: Southampton complete deals for Sadio Mané and Toby Alderweireld

fields.headline: Southampton complete deals for Sadio Mané and Toby Alderweireld
fields.bodyText: Toby Alderweireld and Sadio Mané have completed their deadline-day moves to Southampton, who have managed to keep hold of Morgan Schneiderlin and Jay Rodriguez. At the end of what has been a hectic summer at St Mary’s Ronald Koeman’s side managed to make two impressive additions as several players left on loan. Alderweireld, 25, who plays mainly in central defence but can also fill in at right-back, joined from the Primera Division champions Atlético Madrid on a season-long loan with the option for a permanent move, which it is understood would cost Saints €8m (£6.3m). Mané, 22, who plays in midfield, arrives on a four-year deal from Red Bull Salzburg for a fee understood to be £10m, while Gastón Ramírez’s move to Hull is the main outgoing player on the final.
